title: taylorswift13
text: Welcome taylorswift13! vignette provides overview package, including install , access datasets, utilize Shiny app data visualization analysis. site tribute Taylor Swift, renowned singer-songwriter known captivating music storytelling. package contains datasets Taylor Swift’s albums songs, enabling fans analysts explore discography -depth.

title: taylorswift13
text: install taylorswift13 GitHub, use following commands:

title: taylorswift13
text: taylorswift13 includes three main datasets: taylor_album: Information Taylor Swift’s albums. taylor_album_songs: Details songs album. taylor_all_songs: Comprehensive data Taylor Swift’s songs. access datasets, use following commands:

title: taylorswift13
text: taylor_album Description: dataset provides metadata Taylor Swift’s albums, including release dates ratings.

title: taylorswift13
text: Description: Detailed information song within Taylor Swift’s albums, covering musical features release details.

title: taylorswift13
text: Description: aggregated dataset encompassing songs Taylor Swift, facilitating comprehensive analyses across entire discography.

title: taylorswift13
text: Shiny app allows visualize various aspects Taylor Swift’s discography, including song characteristics, album metrics,song comparisons. Explore app gain insights Taylor Swift’s musical evolution! Features Shiny App: Dashboard Layout: Organized interface easy navigation. Interactive Plots: Utilize ggplot2 plotly dynamic visualizations. Data Tables: Explore datasets sortable searchable tables using DT. Filter Options: Customize views based album, song features, .

title: taylorswift13
text: ’s simple example visualize distribution song energy across Taylor Swift’s albums using ggplot2:
code: library(taylorswift13) library(ggplot2)  # Load the album songs data data(taylor_album_songs)  # Plot energy distribution ggplot(taylor_album_songs, aes(x = album_name, y = energy)) +   geom_boxplot(fill = "steelblue") +   theme_minimal() +   labs(title = "Distribution of Song Energy Across Albums",        x = "Album",        y = "Energy Score")

title: taylorswift13
text: hope taylorswift13 enhances analysis appreciation Taylor Swift’s musical journey! information, check package documentation explore Shiny app.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Shalini Nair. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Nair S (2024). taylorswift13: Taylor Swift Lyrics Song Data Taylor Swift's Discography. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://etc5523-2024.github.io/taylorswift13/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {taylorswift13: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography},   author = {Shalini Nair},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://etc5523-2024.github.io/taylorswift13/}, }

what: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography
title: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography
text: site explores interesting insights Taylor Swift’s music, lyrics, albums. dive deep emotional content, genres, themes using modern data analytics tools.

title: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography
text: Albums Overview Audio Features Song comparison

what: Launch the Taylor Swift Dashboard App — launch_app
title: Launch the Taylor Swift Dashboard App — launch_app
text: function launches Shiny dashboard exploring Taylor Swift's albums songs.

title: Launch the Taylor Swift Dashboard App — launch_app
Taylor Swift Albums — taylor_album
text: data frame listing Taylor Swift's albums.

title: Taylor Swift Albums — taylor_album
text: data frame following columns: X Row identifier album_name Name album ep Indicates whether album EP (Extended Play) album_release Release date album metacritic_score Metacritic aggregate score album user_score User-generated score album

title: Taylor Swift Albums — taylor_album
code: data(taylor_album) head(taylor_album) #>   X                          album_name    ep album_release metacritic_score #> 1 1                        Taylor Swift FALSE    2006-10-24               67 #> 2 2 The Taylor Swift Holiday Collection  TRUE    2007-10-14               NA #> 3 3                      Beautiful Eyes  TRUE    2008-07-15               NA #> 4 4                            Fearless FALSE    2008-11-11               73 #> 5 5                           Speak Now FALSE    2010-10-25               77 #> 6 6                                 Red FALSE    2012-10-22               77 #>   user_score #> 1        8.5 #> 2         NA #> 3         NA #> 4        8.4 #> 5        8.6 #> 6        8.5 summary(taylor_album) #>        X          album_name            ep          album_release      #>  Min.   : 1.00   Length:14          Mode :logical   Length:14          #>  1st Qu.: 4.25   Class :character   FALSE:12        Class :character   #>  Median : 7.50   Mode  :character   TRUE :2         Mode  :character   #>  Mean   : 7.50                                                         #>  3rd Qu.:10.75                                                         #>  Max.   :14.00                                                         #>                                                                        #>  metacritic_score   user_score    #>  Min.   :67.00    Min.   :8.200   #>  1st Qu.:75.25    1st Qu.:8.375   #>  Median :78.00    Median :8.500   #>  Mean   :79.25    Mean   :8.583   #>  3rd Qu.:85.00    3rd Qu.:8.900   #>  Max.   :91.00    Max.   :9.000   #>  NA's   :2        NA's   :2

title: Taylor Swift Album Songs — taylor_album_songs
text: data frame containing details songs Taylor Swift's albums.

title: Taylor Swift Album Songs — taylor_album_songs
text: data frame following columns: X Row identifier album_name Name album song belongs ep Indicates whether album EP (Extended Play) album_release Release date album track_number Track number song within album track_name Title song artist Name artist featuring Featured artists track, bonus_track Indicates song bonus track promotional_release Indicates song released promotional purposes single_release Indicates song released single track_release Release date individual track danceability Danceability score (0.0 1.0) energy Energy score (0.0 1.0) key Musical key song (numeric representation) loudness Loudness track decibels (dB) mode Mode track (0 = Minor, 1 = Major) speechiness Speechiness score (0.0 1.0) acousticness Acousticness score (0.0 1.0) instrumentalness Instrumentalness score (0.0 1.0) liveness Liveness score (0.0 1.0) valence Valence score (0.0 1.0) tempo Tempo track beats per minute (BPM) time_signature Time signature track (e.g., 4 4/4) duration_ms Duration track milliseconds explicit Indicates track contains explicit lyrics key_name Musical key name (e.g., C major) mode_name Mode name (e.g., Major Minor) key_mode Combined key mode information

title: All Taylor Swift Songs — taylor_all_songs
text: comprehensive data frame Taylor Swift's songs, including related information.

title: All Taylor Swift Songs — taylor_all_songs
text: data frame following columns: X Row identifier album_name Name album song belongs ep Indicates whether album EP (Extended Play) album_release Release date album track_number Track number song within album track_name Title song artist Name artist featuring Featured artists track, bonus_track Indicates song bonus track promotional_release Indicates song released promotional purposes single_release Indicates song released single track_release Release date individual track danceability Danceability score (0.0 1.0) energy Energy score (0.0 1.0) key Musical key song (numeric representation) loudness Loudness track decibels (dB) mode Mode track (0 = Minor, 1 = Major) speechiness Speechiness score (0.0 1.0) acousticness Acousticness score (0.0 1.0) instrumentalness Instrumentalness score (0.0 1.0) liveness Liveness score (0.0 1.0) valence Valence score (0.0 1.0) tempo Tempo track beats per minute (BPM) time_signature Time signature track (e.g., 4 4/4) duration_ms Duration track milliseconds explicit Indicates track contains explicit lyrics key_name Musical key name (e.g., C major) mode_name Mode name (e.g., Major Minor) key_mode Combined key mode information lyrics Lyrics song

what: taylorswift13: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography — taylorswift13-package
title: taylorswift13: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography — taylorswift13-package
text: Provides comprehensive datasets analysis tools Taylor Swift's albums songs, including interactive Shiny app data visualization.

title: taylorswift13: Taylor Swift Lyrics and Song Data for Taylor Swift's Discography — taylorswift13-package
text: Maintainer: Shalini Nair snai0031@student.monash.edu
